Html:
Hi, I'm using the addExternalSheet() function to copy a worksheet from one excel file to another. However, the autoshape elements such as the arrows were not copied over.

I was browsing to find answers and saw in https://phpexcel.codeplex.com/discussions/443508 that PHPExcel did not support this two years ago. I was wondering if this is still the case today?

Thank you!
